author: Gagingi
title: Fantastic - perfect audience three-year-old
review:
We got this set for our four-year-old, and whilst he loves it, it would have been perfect for a three-year-old.  There is so much creative play he can do with it.  It doesn't take long to assemble, and as the characters were ready-built, he could play with those while we put it together.  It's perfect for a child who is really into "families".  

It is a bigger ticket item, but I'd not hesitate for a three-year-old!
